data.event: Grave finds near Bell, particularly the Wagon Grave of Bell from late Hallstatt times (about 500 BC), show that the area was settled by Celts.

event.title: belonged Leideneck, Horn, Alterkülz and even the later castle and residence town of Kastellaun, now

data.event: Bell was also the main centre of a parish to which belonged Leideneck, Horn, Alterkülz and even the later castle and residence town of Kastellaun, now the seat of the Verbandsgemeinde.
